title: Hydrothermal Coliquefaction of Anaerobic Digestate with Polyphenolic Extracts from Agricultural Byproducts Producing Nearly Nitrogen-Free Biocrude Oil
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00762J, Paper
Hanifrahmawan Sudibyo, Budhijanto Budhijanto, Aqiela Mahannada, Ahmad Suparmin, Joko Wintoko, Dwi Joko Prasetyo, Muslih Anwar, Crisp√≠n Celis
We studied the potential of producing biocrude with ultralow nitrogen content via hydrothermal coliquefaction (co-HTL) of sewage sludge digestate and various polyphenolic extracts from apple pomace, olive pomace, spent coffee...
